name: Advanced Sorting
description: Adds advanced sorting capabilities to your Jellyfin library. Sort movies and videos by video bitrate, file size, community rating, and IMDb Top 250 ranking. Includes API endpoints for flexible sorted queries and a built-in IMDb Top 250 list that can be updated via the API.
overview: Sort by video bitrate, file size, community rating, and IMDb Top 250 rank

versions.changelog: Initial release with video bitrate, file size, community rating, and IMDb Top 250 sorting support.
